com.tealium.internal.tagbridge

Class TagBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.internal.tagbridge.TagBridge

  • public final class TagBridge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class evaluates TagBridge invocations, caches client-provided commands, and dynamically loads and caches stock TagBridge commands.
    Since:
    2014-11-11
